name: Run Run!
description:
Run Run ! A simple game made in panic and with haste, all about doing stuff in panic and with haste ! Gotta click a button to jump ? Check! Now gotta also pull a lever ? Check! What now, wind up a crank too ?

As the game progresses, more and more tasks are asked to the player to do in a limited time, until the runner miss his jump and meets his demise with the wall.

A Game made for create jam fall 2019 by PanicTeam!, a.k.a. two random guys with no experience whatsoever.
